name: Pixel Space Blast
description:
Defeat your enemies and upgrade your defender spaceship. How far can you go? 👽

Super fun for all ages, attack the blocks is an awesome space pixel game to kill time!

Choose one cool shuttle and save the universe🛫

Features:
-Simple pixel perfect graphic 👾
-Endless gameplay 🏓
-Simple control 🕹
-Boss fight ⛹️‍♂️
-Many beatifull pixel bosses themes and galaxies will random 👀
-Free to play ✔
-Shoot up all balls 👌
-Google Play support
-Achievements
